text: Polycera risbeci is a species of sea slug, a nudibranch, a shell-less marine gastropod mollusc in the family Polyceridae.Bouchet, P. (2015). Polycera risbeci. In: MolluscaBase (2015). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species on 2017-01-09. == Distribution == This species is found in the central Indo-Pacific region. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Polyceridae Category:Gastropods described in 1941
title: Polycera risbeci
